summary: This replaces the Maintheme of Skyrim with a Piano Medlay from Kingdome Hearts 2
descriptionHtml:
To hear what you get, I linked the Video Source in the \"Video\" Tab
(Notice that i cuted it a bit at the beginning)

This replaces the Maintheme of Skyrim with a Piano Medley from Kingdome Hearts 2

Install:
1.Unrar the Archiv
2.Place \"music\" into you\'r Skyrim/Data folder
3.Enjoy the Sound

Uninstall:
1.Smiply delete Skyrim/Data/music/special/mus_maintheme.xwm

I don\'t care if you dont like this, it was made for personal use.
author: Lify
